Class Provider

extends java.lang.Object
    JMS provider configuration.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addContext(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String value)
      Add a context variable, which is used to initialize a properties object for use in JNDI: InitialContext jndiContext = new InitialContext(properties);
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getContext()
      Returns context variables.
      java.lang.String getObjectName()
      Returns the object name to look up in a JNDI provider connection factory through the lookup: ConnectionFactory factory = (ConnectionFactory) jndiContext.lookup(connectionFactory);
      void setContext(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> context)
      Sets context variables.
      void setObjectName(java.lang.String objectName)
      Sets the connection factory object name for JNDI lookup.

        public void addContext(java.lang.String name,

        Add a context variable, which is used to initialize a properties object for use in JNDI: InitialContext jndiContext = new InitialContext(properties);

        value - value to add

      • getObjectName

        public java.lang.String getObjectName()
        Returns the object name to look up in a JNDI provider connection factory through the lookup: ConnectionFactory factory = (ConnectionFactory) jndiContext.lookup(connectionFactory);
        Returns:
        object name
